text:
Kang kwon joo keluar dari kamar mandi setelah menggantungkan handuk yang telah ia pakai. Ia melihat Do kang woo sedang sibuk menyiapkan sarapan pagi.
"Makanlah dulu" Ucap Do kang woo yang telah mendudukkan dirinya setelah dirasa semua makanan telah tertata rapi di atas meja.
Kang kwon joo tersenyum tipis, menyelipkan anak rambutnya ke belakang telinga dan berjalan menuju meja makan.
"Kau bisa memasak, [redacted_name]?" tanya Kang Kwon Joo yang menatap beberapa makanan yang ada disana
"Aku hanya melihat internet. Aku pikir, kita tidak akan sempat mampir ke restoran untuk membeli sarapan, jadi aku membuat beberapa olahan yang menurutku mudah"
Kang Kwon joo mulai mencicipi makanan.
"Tidak terlalu buruk untuk seorang pemula, [redacted_name]" Puji Kang Kwon joo dengan senyuman
trans:
Kang Kwon Joo stepped out of the shower after hanging the towel he just used. He saw that Do Kang Woo was busy preparing breakfast.
"Eat first," said Do Kang Woo who sat himself after all the food had been arranged neatly on the table.
Kang Kwon Joo gave a faint smile, tucked his baby hair behind the ear and walked to the table.
"You can cook, [redacted_name]?" asked Kang Kwon Joo who was looking at some of the food there
"I just saw it on the internet. I thought, we wouldn't have time to stop by a restaurant to buy breakfast, so I made several dishes that I thought were easy"
Kang Kwon Joo started tasting the food.
"Not too bad for a beginner, [redacted_name]" praised Kang Kwon Joo with a smile.
